divs: Sighting DetailsI was comin home from a friends house one night.it was a very clear night,you could see all the stars and everything.It was me,in the back of the car,my friend,in the front,and her mom drivin..we was bout 12 at the time and although this was 10 years ago,i can remember almost everything from 15 years ago or further,no exageration...anywayz,we drivin and we come to the top of the dyke...and all of a sudden my friend said "oh my God,what the f*** is that?!!!"..and we looked to the left and saw 5 huge balls of lights..So her mom looked and slammed on the breaks.they didnt move at all..they where just sittin there in one spot..they sat in a zig zag position..id have to say these things were about 2 or more miles away from us.i was in shock at first but nothing shocks me too much so i jus felt like,this is pretty cool..very interesting.they never moved and these lights were white and unbeleivebly bright...if you could take a star and blow it up in size about 10times,thats what they looked like..so after a couple of minutes she dropped me off at my house,which was only 3 houses away from that dyke.grabbed my mom and ran her over there and they were still there.for whatever reason i also had brought out the house fone,i guess to make a call and when i turned it on it was staticy..ive done this before but it was never staticy before.anywayz.she believed what she saw kuz this was her 3rd time seein a ufo..they had absolutely no noise whatsoever..you couldnt here ANYTHING!..then in a blink of an eye they were gone.when they left i started to feel a lil warm..not from being excited because this was before the real excitement arose and i didnt understand why i felt like that.now we know what airplanes look like.i live on the shore,so theres an airport across the water,i live 45minutes away from the newark airport,and theres another one not too far..i see and hear them all the time..theres helicopters i see all the time..and i know what military crafts look like bekuz alot of my family was or is still in the military and i was going to sign up myself..what i saw resembled absolutely none of those crafts...helicopters are really the only ones that jus hover in one spot but they dont have lights that bright and they are pretty loud..i deffinately know what i saw and i must say that was pretty impressionable,it left a VERY vivid memory.
